title: Sr. Data & Analytics Manager
description: The Data & Analytics discipline plays a crucial role in achieving our organization's mission of delivering cutting-edge Data & AI solutions to our clients. Our team comprises highly skilled individuals who are deeply committed to attain maximum value generation ensuring our customer's success. We are seeking a qualified and visionary professional to lead our data and analytics teams with a focus on applied machine learning & Gen AI for our Data Products, furthering our ongoing growth and success.As a Senior Data & Analytics Manager, you will play a critical and strategic role in defining data and analytics strategies that are closely aligned with our organizational goals and tailored to meet our clients' specific needs. Your primary focus will be to lead the delivery of Advanced Analytics Data Products, including Applied Machine Learning and Generative AI, by leveraging our internal data assets to their fullest potential. Your expertise will drive the development of innovative solutions that position us at the forefront of the industry and empower our clients with cutting-edge data derived capabilities.If you are a person with a disability and are unsure whether you can apply, know that all vacancies at Blip are inclusive! You've demonstrated an unparalleled ability to not only meet but exceed client expectations consistently, turning clients into loyal advocates.Beyond the standard qualifications, a candidate who stands out for this senior position possesses remarkable attributes that are true game-changers:- Innovative Strategist: You're not just strategic; you're an innovator at heart. Your track record showcases your knack for redefining data and analytics strategies that don't just align but set new industry standards.- Change Catalyst: Your leadership isn't just about managing; it's about being a catalyst for change. Your hands-on experience isn't just implementing solutions; it's pushing the boundaries of what's possible in data analytics, engineering, and science.- Cultural Architect: Your influence extends beyond teams; you're a cultural architect.
